title: The Rescuers
sub_head: America’s president may abandon our friends but many Americans won’t.
body:
Politicians including the president of the United States may be failing us. But the amazing people of the U.S. military, including those who are formally retired, are stepping into the breach. War veterans who fulfilled every unreasonable request our nation made of them during the long years of warfare are now headed back to Afghanistan to save the people our government is abandoning.
James Gordon Meek of ABC News reports:
The ad hoc rescue team, many of whose members had not met until just a few days ago and some of whom have been out of the service for years, are doing what our president will not allow our armed forces to do. ABC reports:
The fascinating ABC report adds:
President Joe Biden and the Taliban have insisted on Aug. 31 as the deadline for U.S. troops to withdraw from the country. This means that after Tuesday any remaining Americans and friends of America may be forced to rely on such private charitable ventures to survive.
